attributes.name: count
attributes.desc: how many fake items to render to the DOM

attributes.name: rows
attributes.desc: numbers of the row, only useful when no template slot were given

attributes.name: throttle
attributes.desc: rendering delay in milliseconds. Numbers represent delayed display, and can also be set to delay hide, for example { leading: 500, trailing: 500 }. When needing to control the initial value of loading, you can set { initVal: true }
attributes.optionValue: { leading?: number, trailing?: number, initVal?: boolean }
